abstract: The China Construction Bank Corporation said first-half profit fell 4.9 percent on contracting loan margins.
snippet: The China Construction Bank Corporation said first-half profit fell 4.9 percent on contracting loan margins.
lead_paragraph: The China Construction Bank Corporation said first-half profit fell 4.9 percent on contracting loan margins. Net income declined to 55.8 billion renminbi ($8.2 billion), or 0.24 renminbi a share, from 58.7 billion renminbi, or 0.25 renminbi a share, a year earlier, the bank said Friday. Construction Bank, battling lower lending margins and concerned about the risk of rising defaults, plans to make fewer loans in the second half.

headline.main: Profit Falls at China Construction Bank
headline.print_headline: Profit Falls at China Construction Bank
